response.answer_text: Ohhh my gosh!!! 2020 and summarize a whole fucking year it ain't easy but let me try:) First of all 2020 will be the year that everyone will be remembered for rest of their life until they died.It isn't easy to live this kind of life we never assume we had to seen those kind of days.Personally my experience like one of the worst ever in my whole life because I have some anxiety and depression problems so I have been through some Jack shit. I'm lone wolf so my circumstances was like can't bear anything and can't say to anyone.It's kinda look scary when I look to those days oh man I can't fucking believe that. somedays it feels like a hell of a dream when I wake up at morning.From now on still 3 months left for this year but one thing I learned the most from this pandemic is just live for today you can never predict what's going to happen tomorrow. I would summarize 2020 as the year the world turn their back against God. All the fighting, looting, the burning of cities, the killing of innocent people and children makes me think Satan is in control. That is not quite true because if that was the case we wouldn't be here. All believers and those that died believing in Christ would be in heaven. The Antichrist would be in control we are in the prelude to the change, because Jesus is coming for his church and the Antichrist is at the door knocking ready to come in as soon as the restrainer is gone. How can people think that Ordinary People can turn this world around? They can't without God and God will take revenge against the non-believers, demons, the Antichrist, the false prophet and Satan. That is what we are headed for Jesus is coming he's at the door with his hand on the knob. Who can withstand his judgment against an unbelieving world? No one but his people the Believers of Christ can withstand. Non-believers need to accept Christ as our Lord and savior and believe did he died on that cross for them to cover their sins. They need to repent, accept Christ, believe In Christ and his father surrender their soul to him.
